settings.title: Introducing Emma Sleep Holidays
settings.subtitle: Win a dreamy weeklong holiday, courtesy of Emma!

settings.content: To coincide with the start of the summer season, Emma – The Sleep Company is proud to launch Emma Sleep Holidays: an exclusive range of unique getaways to promote rest and recuperation, bookable this 2023. We’re also launching a global competition that gives people the chance to win an Emma Sleep Holiday — a week full of rest, relaxation, and the best sleep experience in a stunning secret location, courtesy of Emma.

settings.heading: What is a sleep holiday?
settings.content: Sleep holidays are the latest tourism trend that prioritise rest and rejuvenation as the core elements of your vacation. They provide an escape from daily routines by immersing holidaymakers in natural environments that promote relaxation and restoration. To help make your sleep holiday dreams come true, we'll be introducing Emma Sleep Holidays later this year. And for those who can't wait until then, you can enter now to win the first ever Emma Sleep Holiday!

settings.heading: We're in need of a great sleep holiday!
settings.content: We partnered with Appinio to find out exactly how we feel about sleep on holiday. The results show that the thing people miss most when they go on holiday is their bed (41%) and while 77% of us would love to go on a ‘sleep holiday’, only 18% have done so. What's more, a whopping 98% of people considering good sleep to be a vital component of a holiday, so it's easy to see why sleep tourism is a booming trend.

settings.heading: What our Sleep Experts say
settings.content: Our Sleep Experts believe that a sleep holiday offers an array of benefits by considering the intricate connections linking sleep, brain function, and hormonal balance. Several scientific studies indicate that exposure to natural environments improves sleep quality by regulating our hormone balance. On top of that, natural settings decrease cortisol levels - the primary stress hormone - thereby improving sleep and overall well-being.

settings.heading: Win an Emma Sleep Holiday by guessing the location!
settings.content: For to the chance to win the very first Emma Sleep Holiday, all you have to do is guess which country these images were taken in. If you're the lucky winner, we'll contact you on 12th July 2023. What are you waiting for? Enter now!

settings.title: How can I win?
settings.content: Click here to enter. You will see three photos inside, all taken in the same country. Can you guess which country these were taken in? We will then randomly select a winner whose guess is correct!

settings.title: How can I participate?
settings.content: Click here to participate. Simply fill out your details and guess the country where you believe the pictures were taken.

settings.title: Who can participate?
settings.content: To participate in this competition, you must be over 18 and live in one of these countries: Portugal, Italy, Spain, the UK, Ireland, France, Belgium, Denmark, the USA, or Canada.

settings.title: When will the winner be announced?
settings.content: The winner will be announced on July 12, 2023.

settings.title: When will the Sleep Holiday take place?
settings.content: We will contact the official winner to finalize a suitable week during the summer of 2023 for the first Emma Sleep Holiday.
